messages.message:
Great Opportunity with a Growing Company in Chandler, AZ!!

Hi Brian, 

I came across your profile and had to reach out to you regarding a great opportunity. I am not sure if you would even consider a changeâ€¦but it can never hurt to listen. Although it looks like I may be too late? :)

I am working with an innovative company where you would be working in a cross functional team using the latest development technologies and agile practices. A coders dream!! The company is well funded, has proven success and is growing. 

It is also a huge plus if you have a passion for education...which it seem that you do.

Just let me know when we can chat.

Thanks, 
Sally

Sally Thomson
sally@envyresources.com
So Brian...are you open to a chat?
StrongMind. They have developed a Learning Management System that is for 6-12.

It seems like a really good company. I am sure they will want to talk to you.

S
I don't think I ever heard back.
Hmmm, that is surprising. I don't think your resume got into the right hands. How long ago was it? They had a new SD Manager start about a month ago.
Also Chandler is really far for me. Anything in Scottsdale?
Just some low-level Java stuff. I can keep you posted.
